message.body: Have you ever installed a Fiat terrazzo shower base?

Hmm. It's got a weird drain attachment system that either requires oakum and lead or plastic lead or a silicon gasket which the 2" pvc slides into. Any preference in those options? Actually I can't do lead so either oakum and plastic lead or a silicon gasket?
Oakum and a two part epoxy is always an option
Is the plastic lead stuff ok or epoxy is better?
I don't know about plastic lead stuff
Ok. It's a one part thing. I might just go for the gasket but intuitively it seems like it might be prone to leaking over time
Does the system come with a supplied gasket?
Nope but you can order one that is specifically for it. This base is fucking heavy. We have to chain hoist it through the open floor joists tomorrow
That's no joke, can you send me a link to the product, I'd like to look at it
60" x 36" fiat terrazzo Monterey. I can't get a link easily from my phone
It weighs about as much as an Italian car which I think that's where it's from. Craigslist find
If there's a rubber gasket specific for it I would trust that
Ok thanks for the advice. I'm still entertaining school for plumbing so I should talk to Andrew
There's also a full time school situation but it costs as much as a regular college
